transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir Ultra Power Control se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Sir very good evening main Rishu baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Recording line pe sir actually aapka ek discussion hua hoga na Vishal ji ke sath jo hamare business manager hai aapki mere se bhi baat hui thi pehle to aapka refund se related issue tha na sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To unhone sir aapko I hope clear kar diya hoga refund se related.
Customer: Kuch clear nahi kiya hai madam mujhe na main main aapko dusre do hath jod kar agar nahi hota hai na to aap mera time waste mat kariye main na India mart ke naam se mere ko nafrat hone lagi hai sahi me batao madam itna pareshan to mere ko meri wife bhi nahi karti hai.
Customer: Mere ko aap shanti se dhandha karne de agar nahi karna dena hai to aap please mera number delete mar dijiye kyuki na ye main abhi itna pareshan ho chuka hu na ye company se ki baat mat pucho.
Executive: Sir aapko koi pareshan nahi karega fir aisi koi.
Customer: Aapka aapka totally kam main main aapko likh ke de sakta hu madam aap logo ka kam totally pareshan karne ka hai aap customer ki complaint ko nahi sunte sunne ke baad action lena jada aap solution kyu bar bar de rahe ho mere ko solution nahi chahiye madam.
Customer: Aap kyu mere ko solution de rahe ho.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir agar refund hota to hum kar dete sir.
Customer: Aap batao aap bol rahe ho ki refund nahi hota hai maine already aapko proof bhi diya hua hai to.
Executive: Sir hua hoga but it wo initially stage pe hua hoga.
Customer: Are madam initially stage se main do saal se complaint kar raha hu madam initially stage matlab aap logo ko abhi initially stage dikh raha hai do saal main last dedh saal se to main service bhi use nahi kar raha hu aapko samajh me aa raha hai main itna paisa invest karke main service use nahi kar raha hu to mere ko bhi kuch to andar ja raha taklif ho raha hoga na madam.
Executive: Sir baat bilkul theek hai.
Customer: Aap aap itna samjho ki mera ek lead kam se kam 100 150 rup ka ek lead ja raha hai main aise hi nahi jane de raha hu na mere ko bhi mere paise ki izzat hai to aap samjho main bhi itna pareshan ho chuka hoga taki main mera paisa bhi waste nahi jane de raha hu aap samajh rahe ho.
Executive: Sir main samajh rahi hu aur aapne mujhe bataya bhi tha but sir dekho aapne october me teen din service ko login kiya hai november me do din kiya hai ye main check kar pa rahi hu mujhe pata hai.
Customer: Main main madam main wo login nahi kar raha hu wo kya hota hai ki hum log search marte hai na kuch for example koi cheez search mari abhi meri team hai na yaha pe char panch logo ki team hai un logo ne kuch google me search mara to by default waha pe click ho gaya hoga india mart generate hoke lo direct hamara wo login rehta hai page to login ho jata hai waha pe aur aapko dikhta hai ki login ho gaya hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab maine wo aapka by lead consumption behavior pe bataya hai sir wo activation days.
Customer: Kiya hoga koi ladke ne mere ko nahi malum kabhi kabhi kya hai mobile me notification aata ho to us hisab se hua hoga main mana nahi kar raha hu aapko but main mere end se kabhi india mart ko login mere mobile me at least application bhi nahi hai kyuki aapka totally mere hisab se totally kam waste of product hai waste of money hai waste of time hai.
Executive: Sir aap kijiye hum to chahte hain aap services ko acche se use karo.
Customer: Kya madam kya aap chahte ho matlab main abhi ek to pehle aapko time du aap uske baad kam karoge uske baad jo mera time jayega uske baad mere ko malum hai wo dhandha to bhi nahi aane wala hai.
Executive: Sir aap sirf by lead consume kariye aapko aur kuch nahi karna hai main aap by lead consume karenge aapka sara kam ho jayega sir.
Customer: Madam meri baat suno aap aap jo bol rahe ho na ki by lead consume karo ye karo usme jo by leads aati hai na wo sab mere jaise suppliers hai uske andar koi bhi jo mere lagta client ho na wo main aapko pehle bhi bata chuka hu ki usme main khali big buyer ke function ki wajah se hi wo teen saal ka project maine liya tha barabar usme kya hota hai big buyers me only for end user ki requirement rehti hai to jo bade clients rehte hain na uski requirement rehti hai waha pe hamare chance jyada rehte hain barabar but wo function hi waha se hat gaya aur yaha pe by lead aap dekhoge na by lead me aapko ek bhi OEM client nahi dikhega main lead hum log dekhte hai hame samajh me aa jata hai madam aap bolo to abhi aapke samne proof deta hu bolo.
Executive: Sir ek do by lead consume karke dekh lete hain sir aap matlab abhi main by lead section me hu hai na aur aapka recent by lead pe check kar rahi hu ji.
Customer: Haan ek minute ha bolo abhi kaha pe jana hai.
Executive: Sir by lead pe jaiye aap.
Customer: Haan by lead pe aaya uske baad.
Executive: Uske baad sir by lead pe aap all over india deal karte hain sir ya fir local pe.
Customer: Main pura all over main kam se kam 22 country me kam karta hu madam bolo.
Executive: Okay okay sir aap india pe filter lagaiye aur apne recent lead pe check kijiye sir.
Customer: Haan recently LNT ka aa raha hai two pole MCCB pune ka.
Executive: Haan ji ye usse upar bhi do inquiry hai sir HRC fuse link andhra pradesh se hai and fir aap.
Customer: Isme wo nahi dikha raha hai recent me main aa raha hu to ek LNT hi dikh raha hai idhar.
Executive: Sir india ka filter lagaya aapki location.
Customer: India india lagaya haan aur fir recent pe abhi aaya HRC fuse link.
Executive: Haan ji haan kaunsa bolo bolo usko purchase karo.
Customer: Sir aap mujhe batayenge na ki kaunsi jyada.
Executive: Main dekho main sab product me mere pass SRC fuse bhi hai ki fuji ka bhi product hai LNT ka hai ABM papers hai LC1D fuse jo hai na wo bhi mera product hai aap jo bolo wo lead me purchase karu aap bol rahe ho na main to main to madam hai na ye din me dekhu na ye mere ko to malum hi padta hai isme se aap jitna bhi bolo na ye jitna lead show ho raha hai na yaha pe aath se 10 lead barabar abhi jitna bhi aap samajh lo ki 15 jo bhi lead show ho raha hai na usme se ek bhi client ka lead nahi hai sab mere jaise supplier filter lagaya aap meri baat samjho aap meri baat suno uska ye jo lead bana hai na uska bhi main aapko bana deta hu barabar for example abhi main yaha pe mera ek product ka requirement hai samjho ki siemens ka 6SL 31202TE130AD0 ye maine google pe search mara mere ko do teen site dikha ek ka dikhta hai siemens ka dikhta hai aur ek india mart ka site abhi kisi ka open hai for example maine usko open kiya abhi ye kiska aa raha hai dhariya engineering ahmedabad ka abhi main isko khali thodi der jyada se jyada max to max two minute isko ye page ko open rakhunga na india mart iska lead generate kar dega.
Executive: Sir abhi aisa nahi hota hai aap karke dekhiyega.
Customer: Madam main abhi ye aaj hi ka main aapko batau aaj hi ka ye abhi aaj hi ka mere sath hua hua case hai abhi main savere ye dhariya engineering me iska detail me check kar raha tha india mart pe maine koi inquiry nahi kiya aaj ke din me mere ko kam se kam 12 13 supplier ka phone aaya ki aapka india mart me ye inquiry mila hai hame ye aaj ka case bata raha hu main live example aapko dikha raha hu.
Executive: Okay aap aaj hi aapne matlab sir aapne apne matlab kisi other number se search kiya tha ya isi register number se search kiya tha sir.
Customer: Mera madam mera ek hi PC chalu hai ek hi mobile hai uske alava kuch chalu nahi hai baki jo PC rehta hai na wo sab me mera internal kam chalu rehta hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund of subscription amount.

- Feels harassed by IndiaMART services.

- Claims buyleads are from suppliers, not clients.



Resolution:

- Executive checked recent leads on the call.

- Executive explained about by lead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, complaints
